Our degree in business management teaches you the practical skills you need to become an effective business leader.

The course covers from management skills, leadership skills, negotiation skills to business strategies, corporate operation practices, human management and elements of the business environment in a multicultural, globalised context and international business environment.

The Business Management degree of University of Greenwich allows students to choose a future career development through the selection of preferable pathways including: Business Management, Events Management, Marketing Management and Communications Management.
